name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Splitz
description:
Super Monkey Ball: Banana Splitz is an action game. It came out on 03-05-2008. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Super Monkey Ball: Banana Splitz on PS Vita.
Jun Tokuhara produced the game. It was directed by Jun Tokuhara and Yuichiro Shirai. Saori Kobayashi and Yoshitaka Hirota scored the game.
